text: Bellingham ( ) is a county seat and city in Whatcom County in the U.S. state of Washington. It is 52 miles (84 km) southwest of Vancouver, 90 miles (145 km) north of Seattle, and 21 miles (33 km) south of the Canada-US border. The cityâ€™s population was 91,482 at the 2020 United States Census. Bellingham is the thirteenth-most populous city in the state of Washington. ==References== Category:County seats in Washington (state) Category:Cities in Washington (state)
title: Bellingham, Washington
